# Source data

```{r load_dataprep}
library(maps); library(sjPlot)
source("dataprep.R")
library(mgcv); library(lme4)
```

# Flockmod

Model with flocksize as response, lon-lat, days, p.index, as predictors, others as random effects.

```{r run_glmer}
#geese = geese %>% filter(complete.cases(lon, t_since_in, p.index, Breeding_year, Observer, Food_type))

flockmod = glmer(flocksize ~ distkol + t_since_in + p.index + (1|Breeding_year) + (1|Observer) + (1|Food_type), data = geese, family = poisson)

```

```{r summary}
summary(flockmod)
```

# Number of families ~ flocksize

```{r gam_fams}
fams2 = fams %>% filter(flocksize>0, flocksize == N_sampled) %>% plyr::mutate(propjuv = propjuv/100)

famsmod = gam(fams ~ s(flocksize) + distkol + p.index+ s(Breeding_year, bs = "re") + s(t_since_in, k = 4) +s(Observer, bs = "re") + s(Food_type, bs = "re"), data = fams2, family = poisson)
```

```{r}
summary(famsmod)
```

```{r}
w = geese %>% group_by(Breeding_year) %>% summarise(prevwinter = first(durwinter))

y = 2001:2017

geese = merge(geese, cbind(w[,"prevwinter"],y), by.x = "Breeding_year", by.y = "y", all.x = T)

```


# Juveniles in flocks


```{r run_modjuvs}
geese = geese %>% filter(complete.cases(Breeding_year, Observer, Food_type, distkol, t_since_in, flocksize, p.index))

#'using arctic birds index
modjuvs = gam(propjuv ~ distkol + flocksize + p.index + s(t_since_in, bs = "cr", pc = 0) + s(Breeding_year, bs = "re") + s(Observer, bs = "re") + s(Food_type, bs = "re"), family = binomial, data = geese)

x = predict(modjuvs, type = "terms", terms = "s(t_since_in)", newdata = geese, se.fit = T)
```

```{r}
summary(modjuvs)
```
